categorization_prompt: Categorize the following email into one of: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do, Social. Provide a one-line reason for the category. Rules: 'To-Do' must include a direct user action or request. 'Important' is for time-sensitive business-critical messages. Output JSON: {"category":"","reason":""}.
action_item_prompt: Extract action items from the email. Return a JSON array of actions: [{"task":"...","deadline":"YYYY-MM-DD or null","assignee":"me/other","confidence":0.0}]. If no task, return an empty array.
auto_reply_prompt: Draft a reply using a polite professional tone. Use the email content and context when provided. If it's a meeting request, propose two time slots and ask for an agenda. Output JSON: {"subject":"...","body":"...","suggested_followups":["..."]}. Keep body under ~200 words.
summarize_prompt: Write a concise summary (2â€“3 lines) of the email and state whether immediate action is required ('yes' or 'no'). Output JSON: {"summary":"...","action_required":"yes/no"}.
